fields.description:
{html}

For parity with Android. Here's what android is sending:

D/TiApplication( 438): (main) [32,2561] Analytics Event: type=ti.crash

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: add support for sending crash logs to analytics

comments.body: Probably only possible to catch fatal exceptions caused by an uncaught @throw via the default handler.
